title: Baked salmon with cheesy breadcrumbs
ingredients: ['4 salmon fillets', '1 1/2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '50g panko breadcrumbs', '20g grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon Italian herb seasoning', '1/8 teaspoon garlic powder']
